data.contentText:
Please complete birth details.
Use the NeoTree Admission form to complete the data.

Please complete birth details.
If NeoTree Admission completed, request this to be copied for inclusion with discharge instead of completing this section. The NeoTree Project Manager can copy it for you.

fields.label: Mode of Delivery
fields.values:
SVD,Spontaneous vaginal delivery
ECS,Emergency Caesarean section
ElCS,Elective Caesarean section
Vent,Ventouse
For,Forceps

fields.label: Place of birth
fields.values:
HCH,Harare Central Hospital
OtH,Other clinic in Harare
OtR,Other clinic outside Harare
H,Home

fields.label: Corrected postnatal weeks at discharge or death
Presenting Complaint
fields.values:
AD,Abdominal distension
BBA,Born before arrival
Conv,Convulsions
DIB,Difficulty breathing
DU,Dumped baby
Fev,Fever
FD,Feeding difficulties
G,Gastroschisis
BA,Hypoxic ischaemic encephalopathy
HIVX,HIV exposed
J,Jaundice
LBW,Low Birth Weight
Apg,Low Apgars
Mec,Possible Meconium aspiration
NTD,Neural tube defect
Prem,Prematurity
PremRDS,Prematurity with RDS
SPn,Pneumonia
OM,Omphalocele
Cong,Congenital abnormality
Mac,Macrosomia
Safe,Safekeeping
Risk,Risk factors for sepsis
O,Other
